text: Gakkō no Kaidan (literally School Ghost Stories) may refer to: * Gakkō no Kaidan (novel series), a series of Japanese light novels by Takaaki Kaima * Gakkō no Kaidan (film), a series of Japanese horror movies based on the books by Toru Tsunemitsu * Ghost Stories (anime), a series of anime episodes * Gakkō no Kaidan (2015 TV series), a series of Japanese drama starring Suzu Hirose ==See also== * Kaidan (parapsychology), ghost or horror story
title: Gakkō no Kaidan
